Content.Text:
Uh oh...
I 'm so sleepy I can't stand up...

Uh oh...
There's no strength left in my body...

Uh oh...
I'm so sleepy I'm going to fall off...

Uh oh...
I'm so sleepy I can't stay sitting in
the chair...
Are you awake?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
How do you feel?
I brought you to the clinic just in
case, but I don't think you're sick.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
What in the world did you think you were
doing? To take care of crops and animals
you must first take care of yourself!
<PAGE>
As long as I'm in town, I refuse to
overlook your unhealthy lifestyle!
<PAGE>
I'll be keeping a close eye on you!
Now are you going to be more careful
from now on?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmph.
So long as you understand.
<PAGE>
Now go home.
It's still before dawn, and you can get
some sleep at home.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
You've had to be brought here <MOJI0> times
now.
<PAGE>
Obviously you didn't understand a word
of what I said to you last time.
<PAGE>
Is your comprehension really that low?
I'm speechless.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
It seems like you don't understand how
important it is to take care of your own
health. So I'll have to lecture you!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
...and that's how it is. Do you get it
now? Make sure you don't push yourself
to the point of fainting again!
I'll be more careful
I don't get it

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmph.
So long as you understand.
<PAGE>
Now go home.
It's still before dawn, and you can get
some sleep at home.

Whoa...
I need to be more careful so I don't
end up fainting again.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You... don't... get it?
After I dumbed it down so you would
understand?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see...
Let me take a different angle on why
it's important to care for your health.
<PAGE>
When you faint, you wake up in this bed.
That means somebody found you and
brought you here.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Whoever brought you here is
naturally going to be worried about you!
They went out of their way to help you!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
If you keep on doing this, you are going
to be causing worry for many people!
Do you get it now?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmph.
So long as you understand.
<PAGE>
Now go home.
It's still before dawn, and you can get
some sleep at home.

Whoa...
I need to be more careful so I don't end
up fainting again.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Did you know that you've been hauled
in here more than 1,000 times?
<PAGE>
Your stupidity exceeds anything I could
imagine. You must make your parents
weep.
